answers.answer: I don't see how you could get anything from the hot wet towel. First they give you clean towels in a salon to start with. Secondly, they are hot and this kills bacteria and viruses. Thirdly you would have to have a open cut on the exact area where you touched the towel.  Your symptoms are from something else.Are you taking any medication? Some medication can cause the tingly feeling. Also diabetes can cause this and rheumatoid arthritis. It may also be a reaction due to stress.  Or even a local burn if the towel was that hot.mkh9
